It rolls to move. If the ground is uneven a suddenjolt from hitting a bump can cause it to explode.
It was discovered when POK  e BALLS were introduced.It is said that there is some connection.
During the study of this Pokemon it was discoveredthat its compo nents are not found in nature.
VOLTORB was first sighted at a company that manufactures POK  e BALLS. The link between that sighting andthe fact that this Pokemon looks very similar to a POK  e BALL remains a mystery.
VOLTORB is extremely sensitive - it explodes at the slightest of shocks. It is rumored that it was first createdwhen a POK  e BALL was exposed to a powerful pulse of energy.
It bears an uncanny and unexplained resemblance to a POK  e BALL. Because it explodes at the slightest shock even veteran TRAINERS treat it with caution.
A life-form whose identity is unknown. It is said to SCREECH or suddenly SELFDESTRUCT.
